bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Submersible Single-Phase Transformers: 167 kVa and Smaller; High Voltage 25 000 V and Below; Low Voltage 600 V and Below (Revison of IEEE C57.12.23-2002)
IEEE Draft Standard for Submersible Single-Phase Transformers: 167 kVa and Smaller; High Voltage 25 000 V and Below; Low Voltage 600 V and Below (Revison of IEEE C57.12.23-2002)
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC57.12.23/D7, Apr 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Electrical, dimensional, and mechanical charasteristics and certain safety features of single-phase, 60Hz, liquid-immersed, self cooled, submersible distribution transformers are covered. This standard is intended for use as a basis for establishing the performance, electrical and mechanical interchangeability, and safety of the equipment covered, and to assist in the proper selection of such equipment.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
